scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/vk-google-font-for-block-theme && rsync -av --progress --exclude dist/ ./ dist/vk-google-font-for-block-theme/ && npm run delete-files
scripts.delete-files: rm -rf dist/vk-google-font-for-block-theme/.git && rm -rf dist/vk-google-font-for-block-theme/dist && find dist/vk-google-font-for-block-theme/ -maxdepth 1 -type f ! \( -name '*.txt' -o -name '*.php' \) -exec rm {} \;
scripts.zip: npm run dist && cd ../ && zip -r vk-google-font-for-block-theme.zip vk-google-font-for-block-theme && cd ..
